Name: Fantasy Mahjong connect
About the game: Fantasy Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board before the time runs out! It's ideal if you want some solo gaming time or a mentally engaging challenge. Now in Fantasy setting and the time is limited! Game Features: Simple, but attractive gameplay! Nice pixel visuals 32 levels to beat Levels with gravity support in all 4 directions Steam Achievements support Shuffle and hint functions helpers
